question.title: Switching between activities in a tab gives error the application has stopped unexpectedly. Please try again

node.contents: I am working on android application and I am struck at the below error. Can anybody of you help me out with this error:

astNode.text: I am working on android application and I am struck at the below error. Can anybody of you help me out with this error:

node.contents: When I switch between activities in a tab I was able to do it for 2 times on 3rd time I get the error saying Sorry...application has stopped unexpectedly. Please try again. I tried to take the info from LogCat file below is the information:

node.contents: I tried to use logcat and got the above information.

astNode.text: I tried to use logcat and got the above information.

node.contents: Can anybody help me to find the solution I get the error only when I go to different activity on 3rd time. First 2 times it works fine.

astNode.text: Can anybody help me to find the solution I get the error only when I go to different activity on 3rd time. First 2 times it works fine.

node.contents: Your UI is too complicated, and you are running out of stack space when trying to render it. Use Hierarchy View and try to reduce the number of layers between the root View of your activity and the farthest leaves.

astNode.text: Your UI is too complicated, and you are running out of stack space when trying to render it. Use Hierarchy View and try to reduce the number of layers between the root View of your activity and the farthest leaves.
